## ExprScope enum

The evaluation scope of an \[\[Expr\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum ExprScope 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Condition | <code>1</code> | The scope of an \[\[Expr\]\] used in a \[\[Technique\]\] <code>when</code> condition. |
|  Dynamic | <code>2</code> | The scope of an \[\[Expr\]\] used as dynamic property attribute value. |
|  Value | <code>0</code> | The scope of an \[\[Expr\]\] used as value of an attribute. |
